Title: Establishes business franchise and personal income tax credits for a portion of the consideration paid under a contract with a minority or women-owned business
Summary: Establishes business franchise and personal income tax credits for a portion of the consideration paid under a contract with a minority or women-owned business.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing business franchise and personal income tax credits for certain businesses which contract with the state or political subdivisions thereof and in unrelated contracts, also with minority and women-owned business enterprises
